data.eml:eml: New species of Central American Rhopalothrix Mayr, 1870 (Hymenoptera, Formicidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Longino, John T., Boudinot, Brendon E. (2013): New species of Central American Rhopalothrix Mayr, 1870 (Hymenoptera, Formicidae). Zootaxa 3616 (4): 301-324, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3616.4.1
